!ConEmu is distributes as msi package «`ConEmu.??????.msi`», or archive named «`ConEmu.Maximus5.??????.7z`».
The archive contains x86 version of !ConEmu.exe,
and both (x86 and x64) versions of ConEmuC.exe and !ConEmuHk.dll.
Theese files are the essential part of the product.
Msi package also contains x64 version of !ConEmu.exe.

The archive and the msi package contains both x86 and x64 versions of !ConEmu FAR plugins
(«`Plugins\ConEmu\ConEmu.dll`» and «`Plugins\ConEmu\ConEmu.x64.dll`» for example).

So, You can simply unpack downloaded archive or install msi package to the
[http://www.farmanager.com/download.php?l=en Far Manager] folder.

Download page: http://code.google.com/p/conemu-maximus5/downloads/list
